name: Unfaithul War
description:
Well.

This game is about destroying a castle with your army.

For the theme i wanted to do a reaaaaally simplistic rts game with the following twist : The more unit you get the more “faith” you lose during the game.

In my mind it could have become a real handicap. But the truth is that i wasn’t able to balance the game in time.

=============

CONTROL

zqsd /wasd : move the camera.

scroll up/down : zoom in/out.

right click on a building : display the interaction.

right click on everything else : your soldiers meet up to become one powerful soldier.

left click : your soldiers go to the point.

=============

I did my best this time but i still can’t find the time to do the music and the sound design haha. This first ludum was fun, next time i hope to be able to finish a game completly (so with the music, sound, balance and bugless -couldn’t fix all, sorry-).
